title: Drawing, "Mounted Cavalry Officer", 1862
medium: Graphite, brush and gray wash on off-white paper
markings: Stamped in ink, lower left: Museum for the Decorative Arts Cooper Union
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical view of a mounted cavalry officer, seen obliquely from the left side; a slight  graphite sketch of the cap, at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mounted Cavalry Officer", 1862.
1862. Graphite, brush and gray wash on off-white paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-156-a.
